field.name: title
field.title: Title
field.description: Campaign Title - Comes from Public Name on Campaign in Salesforce

field.name: description
field.title: Description
field.description: A brief description of this campaign (from Description field on Campaign in Salesforce)

field.name: image
field.title: Image
field.description: The main promotional image for this campaign. This image will be shown big and small so pick an image that looks good at all sizes.

field.name: external_media_url
field.title: External Media URL
field.description: A link to a YouTube video promoting the campaign.

field.name: body
field.title: Fundraising Pitch
field.description: The body of the pitch for this campaign shown above the donation form

field.name: thank_you_message
field.title: Thank You Message
field.description: This is the message displayed to a donor after they have donated.

field.name: donation_receipt_legal
field.title: Donation Receipt Legal Text
field.description: Enter any legal text you want displayed at the bottom of html receipt. For example, you might want to state that all donations are tax deductable and include the organization's Tax ID. This field overrides the site-wide default receipt legal text configured in Fundraising Settings. If no value is provided, the site default text will be used.

field.name: goal
field.title: Goal
field.description: The dollar amount goal for this campaign (from Expected Revenue field on Campaign in Salesforce)

field.name: date_start
field.title: Start Date
field.description: The start date of the campaign

field.name: date_end
field.title: End Date
field.description: The end date of the campaign

field.name: donation_form
field.title: Donation Form
field.description: Select the donation form to use

field.name: default_gift_type
field.title: Default Gift Type
field.description: Select the default gift type to show on the campaign form

field.name: stripe_mode
field.title: Stripe Payment Processing Mode
field.description: Stripe can either run in test or live mode. Test mode allows you to successfully process donations using a dummy card number. Real cards will fail in test mode. Live mode is the full production mode which only accepts valid cards

field.name: stripe_recurring_plan
field.title: Stripe Recurring Plan
field.description: If selected, recurring donations will be enabled on the Stripe form for this campaign and will subscribe donors who opt for recurring to the selected plan in Stripe

field.name: fundraising_seals
field.title: Fundraising Seals Override
field.description: Normally, the site default seals are shown on a campaign. If you want to override the seals displayed only on this campaign, enter the full physical path to the seals here

field.name: status
field.title: Status
field.description: The current status of the campaign (From Status field on Campaign in Salesforce)

field.name: donations_total
field.title: Total Raised
field.description: The total dollar amount raised thus far (from Amount Won Opportunities on Campaign in Salesforce)

field.name: donations_count
field.title: Number of Donations
field.description: Total count of donations

field.name: direct_donations_total
field.title: Direct Total Raised
field.description: The total dollar amount raised thus far donated directly to this campaign

field.name: direct_donations_count
field.title: Number of Direct Donations
field.description: Total count of donations made directly to this campaign

field.name: email_thank_you
field.title: Thank You Email Template
field.description: The Mailchimp/Mandrill template to use when sending thank you emails for this campaign

field.name: email_honorary
field.title: Honorary Email Template
field.description: The Mailchimp/Mandrill template to use when sending honorary emails for this campaign

field.name: email_memorial
field.title: Memorial Email Template
field.description: The Mailchimp/Mandrill template to use when sending memorial emails for this campaign

field.name: email_personal_page_created
field.title: Personal Page Created Template
field.description: The Mailchimp/Mandrill template to use when sending email to new fundraisers immediately after they create their page

field.name: email_personal_page_donation
field.title: Personal Page Donation Template
field.description: The Mailchimp/Mandrill template to use when sending email to notify fundraisers of a donation to their page

field.name: email_list_donors
field.title: Mailchimp List - Donors
field.description: If selected, donors to this campaign will automatically be added to the selected list

field.name: email_list_fundraisers
field.title: Mailchimp List - Personal Fundraisers
field.description: If selected, personal fundraisers in this campaign will automatically be added to the selected list.

field.name: header_image
field.title: Header Image
field.description: If provided, this image will be used as the header graphic for the campaign instead of the site default.

field.name: hide_title_and_description
field.title: Hide Title and Description?
field.description: If checked, the campaign's title and description will be rendered on the page but hidden from view. This is useful if you are using a custom header image that already contains the title and description content.

field.name: donation_form_header
field.title: Header for Donation Forms
field.description: This header will be displayed above donation forms for this campaign. If no value is supplied, the default site-wide header will be used.

field.name: donation_form_description
field.title: Description for Donation Forms
field.description: If provided, this value will be displayed above donation forms for this campaign. If no value is provided, and a site-wide default is set, that default will be used.

field.name: show_media_portlet
field.title: Show Media Portlet?
field.description: Uncheck if you don't want to render the Campaign Media portlet showing the image/external media in the right column

field.name: allow_personal
field.title: Allow Personal?
field.description: If checked, allow the creation of personal campaign pages for this campaign

field.name: personal_only
field.title: Personal Fundraising Only?
field.description: If checked, do not show a donation form on the main fundraising page

field.name: default_personal_appeal
field.title: Default Personal Appeal
field.description: When someone creates a personal campaign, this text is the default value in the Personal Appeal field. The user can choose to keep the default or edit it.

field.name: default_personal_thank_you
field.title: Default Personal Thank You Message
field.description: When someone creates a personal campaign, this text is the default value in the Thank You Message field. The user can choose to keep the default or edit it.
